title: Flyknit Upper, intarsia patterned
description: Flyknit upper with decorative intarsia, combining "high-tech" structure with traditional aesthetics.
author: Elise Co, Martin Bernard, Keda Jiang

title: Green Wool Mesh
description: Localized open-mesh structure test using lace carriage
author: Elise Co, Martin Bernard, Keda Jiang

title: Purple Wool Mesh
description: Localized open-mesh structure test using lace carriage
author: Elise Co, Martin Bernard, Keda Jiang

title: Short-Row Shaping Sample
description: Short-row shaping on punchcard knitting machine
author: Elise Co, Martin Bernard, Keda Jiang

title: Localized Mesh
description: Localized multicolor open-mesh structure test using lace carriage
author: Elise Co, Martin Bernard, Keda Jiang

title: Large-Scale Latch Hook
description: Latch hook sized to knit level-3 (knit from knit from knit) i-cord. Laser cut and manually assembled + shaped
author: Elise Co, An Pan, Ray Cao, Meredith Xu

title: Fractal Knit Blob
description: Level-3 (knit from knit from knit) i-cord
author: Elise Co, An Pan, Ray Cao, Meredith Xu

title: I-cord Levels
description: Base yarn, Level-1 i-cord, and Level-2 i-cord (i-cord knit from Level-1 i-cord)
author: Elise Co, An Pan, Ray Cao, Meredith Xu

title: Level-3 Knitting Machine
description: "Homemade" knitting machine prototype, for knitting circular i-cord. Gauge is large enough to knit level-3 (knit from knit from knit).
author: Elise Co, An Pan, Ray Cao, Meredith Xu

title: Pattern Generator
description: Software interface displays AI-generated 2-color knitting patterns, for human user to view and curate.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: Intentional Collage 01
description: Level-2 digital material, a repeating pattern made from repeating pattern (Bleeding Hearts). The piece intends to make visually meaningful collages made out of the observation from the “patterns” and shapes of each pattern heroImages.
author: Isabelle Chaligne

title: Coca Cola Material
description: Material created through 2D repetition of an object: a Coke can.
author: Qi Tan

title: Selfie Material
description: Material created through repetition of a selfie photo.
author: Christie Wu

title: Text-Message Material
description: Material created through repetition of a text-message exchange.
author: Isabelle Chaligne

title: Digital Dreams
description:
Diorama 1, an interactive virtual 3D space to apply various materials, in endless combinations. 
This is a living room, filled with books, sofas, coffee tables, picture frames, and plants. Each object is textured with personal digital information. These textures contain chat logs, selfies, picture of drink cans. Digital information is invading our brains, competing for our attention and covering our lives. By mapping personal digital information into our living space, I hope to amplify our daily digital behavior to remind people that our lives are constantly being digitized. 
How to interact? Click on any object in the space and you can change the texture attached to it. In the meantime, get your webcam ready and see how you fit into this real and virtual space.
author: Elise Co, Miaoqiong Huang, Nanyi Jiang

title: A Colorful Home
description:
Diorama 2, an interactive virtual 3D space to apply various materials, in endless combinations.
Are you familiar with your home furniture? How do they look like? In this room, we look directly at furniture objects. In this spinning colorful home, the surfaces of those objects are textured with 2D illustrations. Seen from above, our home looks like a colorful picture. 
How to play? Go click on objects and try different texture combinations!
author: Elise Co, Miaoqiong Huang, Nanyi Jiang

title: Floating Islands
description:
Diorama 3, an interactive virtual 3D space to apply various materials, in endless combinations.
Floating Islands is built to examine the materiality and scales of digital materials. Zooming into the scene, we can look at how digital materials are presented on the undulating landscapes on each island. Zooming out of the scene, the 3D model juxtaposes with Google street view suddenly becomes miniature. With different presets of lighting, the material itself is rendered differently despite the identical material setups.
author: Elise Co, Christie Wu, Nanyi Jiang

title: Fake Flat
description:
Diorama 4, an interactive virtual 3D space to apply various materials, in endless combinations.
In this fake flat diorama, thickless and extruded planes are mixed to present a totally 2D scene when audiences look at it from a distance. With the fixed angle camera moving forward, the experience starts to be immersive - planes passing by, audiences can notice not all “planes” are real planes. Meanwhile, the malposition is disclosed - all “planes” are set discretely instead of as a whole.The 2D aesthetic embedded in repetitive textures is inherited to the container of these textures - the diorama.
author: Elise Co, Qi Tan, Nanyi Jiang

title: Sample Swatchbook Page
description: To present knit swatches as technical material, quantitative information was included on each page: concrete measurements, as well as quantified scores and diagrams for material qualities and prospective uses.
author: Elise Co, Mina Lee, Meredith Xu, Ray Cao

title: I-Cord [Level 1]
description: Level-1 I-Cord: I-cord (tubular knit), knit from acrylic
author: Elise Co, An Pan

title: Level 2 I-cord
description: Level-2 (knit from knit) I-cord. I-cord (tubular knit), knit from wool, then knit into I-Cord
author: Elise Co, An Pan

title: Level 3 I-Cord Chain
description: Level-3 (chain from knit from knit) I-cord. I-Cord (tubular knit) knit from wool, then knit into I-Cord, then chained.
author: Elise Co, An Pan

title: Level 3 I-Cord
description: Level-3 (knit from knit from knit) I-cord. I-Cord (tubular knit) knit from wool, then knit into I-Cord, then knit again into I-Cord.
author: Elise Co, An Pan

title: AI Generated A
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its ambiguously figural/geometric shapes.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: AI Generated B
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its ambiguously figural/geometric shapes.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: AI Generated C
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its combination of blocked and dithered (noisy) forms.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: AI Generated D
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its figural shapes, similar to what a human might design.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: AI Generated E
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its balance of foreground/background and nonobvious grid.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: AI Generated F
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its "noisiness" (a visual characteristic not common to human-created knitting patterns)
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: AI Generated G Fairisle
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its interlocking geometric shapes, similar to what a human might design.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: AI Generated H Fairisle
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool. This pattern was human-selected for its interlocking geometric shapes, similar to what a human might design.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: Human Generated Houndstooth
description: Two-color knitting pattern from Passap electronic knitting machine pattern bank, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool.. This pattern was used in the training dataset for a pattern-generating AI model.
author: Elise Co, Ying Huang

title: Human Designed Leopard
description: Two-color knitting pattern from Passap electronic knitting machine pattern bank, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool.. This pattern was used in the training dataset for a pattern-generating AI model.

description: Two-color knitting pattern from Passap electronic knitting machine pattern bank, knit in 2-color fair isle on Brother punchcard knitting machine in wool.. This pattern was used in the training dataset for a pattern-generating AI model.

title: AI Generated Q (inverse)

title: AI Generated V

description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in aqua and blue acrylic double jacquard. This pattern was human-selected for its noisiness.

description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in aqua and blue acrylic double jacquard. This pattern was human-selected for its balance of foreground/backround and symmetry.

title: AI Generated R
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in black and grey wool fairisle. This pattern was human-selected for its ambiguously figural/geometric quality.

title: AI Generated Q
description: AI-generated knit pattern, knit in blue and lilac acrylic fairisle. This pattern was human-selected for its combination of noise and figure.
